description:
Yurisia`s Heart Hybrid Gear is Cross. Yurisia has excellent long-range attacks, and an overwhelming offensive powers. The weapons of her almost have a will of it`s own. They also have extreme destructive capabilities. Almost higher than any other Heart Hybrid Gear.
Source: masou-gakuen-hxh.wikia.com
name: Yurishia Farandole (Heart Hybrid Gear)
